title: Waco Mammoth National Monument: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park          Â    Explore these links to learn more about the Monument:   History  Learn about the discovery, excavation activities, and community conservation efforts     For Further Reading  List of scientific research and publications on mammoths in general and in particular at the site     Education  Information on arranging for school and group tours, on-site educational programs, and lesson plans     Kids &Youth  Links to additional educational activities
